name: Game Center Adventure
description:
This is a game about a Game Center  alumni who graduated three years ago. He has been passionately developing indie games but got exhausted with time. However, recently someone who goes by the initials of  W.S. sent him an email,  and said that they really wanted to talk to him. But he had never heard of this person before.

After a long time he somehow got back in the Game Center- as if it was meant to happen, but there were some weird things awaiting for him. What had happened? He will find that out soon.

WASD - MOVE

LEFT MOUSE -  PICK UP/ OPEN DOORS

C -  Crouch down

BY ALEKS / DIGANTA / YURI
